snippet.title: Bokida - Heartfelt Reunion -- Greenlight Trailer
snippet.description:
Bokida - Heartfelt Reunion is an adventure game with puzzle elements set in a minimalist open world that gradually reveals its beauty. Experience freedom while exploring this intriguing environment and use your abilities to reunite two worlds who were separated a long time ago.

Coming to Windows in Spring 2017 - Support us on Steam Greenlight!
Greenlight : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=831751401
Learn more at : http://bokida.com/
---------------------------------------------------

To follow us on social media:
Twitter► https://twitter.com/bokidagame
Facebook► https://www.facebook.com/BokidaGame/
----------------------------------------------------

Music by
https://xavierdang.bandcamp.com/
----------------------------------------------------
